item.description:
This event is run by the Boston Event Guide. However, Robyn Laing is hosting the group from the Beanstalks. See details below for registration information.

*** 12/21/08 - UPDATE ***
Robyn has gotten us an additional discount.

Boston Event Guide has given us a price break of $10 off ANY package ticket for the Back Bay Gala & the Resolution Ball.

To get the discount, enter the coupon code MEETUP, then click the "Apply" button when buying tickets. Click on the link at the bottom of this event announcement to be taken directly to Back Bay Gala website.

We cordially invite you to the Back Bay Gala: A Baby Boomer New Year's Eve Celebration!

Produced by BostonEventGuide.com
Wednesday, December 31, 2008
7:30pm â€“ 2am

Join us in the elegant ballrooms of The Hyatt Regency Hotel, located in the heart of Downtown Boston.

Your night to remember includes:
*Complimentary cocktail reception and hors d'oeuvres option
*Delicious all-inclusive dinner option
*Live band and DJ
*Online silent auction with fantastic items
*Party favors, gift bags, and multimedia displays
*Hotel room discount
*Tuxedo rentals starting at $59

Slide over to the dance floor as the live band, The Love Dogs, and a DJ help you dance the night away with swing, Motown, soul, R&B, 70s, 80s, 90s, and current top-40 dance hits.

As the clock strikes 12, ring in the new year with tons of party favors and a complimentary toast from our sponsor as we watch the ball drop on huge multimedia displays.

Black-tie optional, premium cocktails.

Tell other Baby Boomers! This event will sell out!

Click here for more information and reservations Back Bay Gala .
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group of tall people.
item.name: New Year's Eve Back Bay Gala
